title.narrative: COMMUNICATIONS, ADVOCACY AND PARTNERSHIPS

description.narrative: New Element, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral - Social And Behaviour Change. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Country programmes are efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: New Element

description.narrative: In line with its ambitious Communication and Advocacy Strategy, the GCO;strengthened UNICEF’s brand recognition and reputation in Greece through the commemoration of UNICEF75, World Children’s Day, announcing the first ever UNICEF Ambassador for Greece and carrying out a number of strategic awareness raising campaigns on key programmatic and advocacy priorities. Internal Brand Awareness and establishment of key mechanisms to ensure high quality production was;prioritized this year with the establishment of a Brand Review Committee;and the completion of Brand trainings for UNICEF employees. | Status:Met | As-of Date:20/01/2022
